intro.description: The next steps show you how to add data using the Data Sets View.

item.title: Select the parent Test Case
item.description: In the Test Case Editor, click on the PerformAddition Test Case.

item.title: Add data to the Test Case
item.description: Click on the Data Sets View, and click the Add button.

subitem.label: This creates one data set which tests that the value "3" is given when "1" and "2" are added.

item.title: Add more data
item.description:
In the Data Sets View, click Add and enter another set of data to test (e.g. 5,6,11).
The whole Test Case will be executed twice because there are two data sets.

subitem.label: Make sure that you have no extra, empty data sets in the data sets view.
